warnings: WARNINGS Warnings: For external use only 1. When you feel irregular response on the applied area such as red spots, swollen skin, itching or rash caused by exposure to direct sunlight, please consult a dermatologist 2. Do not apply to the areas of skin with wounds or other skin problems 3. Cautions on storage 1) Keep out of the reach of children 2) Do not store in direct sunlight
dosage_administration: Directions Directions: Apply mask and leave on for 10-20 minutes.
